p: The viscosities of the HTCs -capsaicin, HTCs-AuNP, and HTCs-capsaicin/AuNP suspensions were determined and compared with that of the HTCs suspension using a Cannon–Fenske viscometer (Yuhuan Ocean Biochemical Co. Ltd., Taizhou, China) at a temperature and stirring speed of 28 °C and 6 rpm, respectively.
